p: COVID-19 patients mainly presents with dry cough, pain throat and myalgia, although every 3 to 4 patients out of 10 have same type of complaints and it was found more to be psychological complaints. Anorexia, dyspnea, sputum production, and myalgias are reported in more than 25% of cases. Sore throat, rhinorrhea, headaches, nausea and diarrhea are less frequent and are mainly observed in mild to moderate forms of the disease.
